pages.md:
# Power Supply/Other

## Power Supply
- **Battery:** NP-W126S rechargeable battery (supplied with camera)

## Battery Life
- **Battery type:** NP-W126S
- **Flash:** Disabled
- **Shooting mode:** Mode P

| PERFORMANCE | Number of shots |
|-------------|-----------------|
|             | LCD  | EVF  | OVF  |
| BOOST       | Approx. 310 | Approx. 250 | Approx. 390 |
| NORMAL      | Approx. 370 | Approx. 350 | Approx. 420 |

### Total Length of Footage That Can Be Recorded on a Single Charge

| Mode               | Actual battery life of movie capture | Continuance battery life of movie capture |
|--------------------|--------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| 4K<sup>1</sup>     | Approx. 45 minutes                   | Approx. 55 minutes                       |
| FHD<sup>2</sup>    | Approx. 50 minutes                   | Approx. 75 minutes                       |
| High-speed movies<sup>3</sup> | Approx. 45 minutes | —                                        |

1. At a frame rate of 29.97 fps.
2. At a frame rate of 59.94 fps.
3. At a frame rate of 120 fps.

> **Note:** Battery endurance varies with battery charge level and the figures given above are not guaranteed. Battery endurance will decline at low temperatures.

## Camera Size
- **Dimensions (W × H × D):** 128.0 mm × 74.8 mm × 53.3 mm (32.7 mm excluding projections, measured at thinnest part) / 5.04 in. × 2.94 in. × 2.10 in. (1.29 in.)

## Camera Weight
- **Approx. 428 g / 15.1 oz.,** excluding battery, accessories, and memory card

## Shooting Weight
- **Approx. 478 g / 16.9 oz.,** including battery and memory card

## Operating Conditions
- **Temperature:** 0 °C to +40 °C / +32 °F to +104 °F
- **Humidity:** 10% to 80% (no condensation)
